1566248008_1KSUcqHRcq26pF5vJ2297jrNcAzkN.body: Cannot get in.  Have been unable to do so for over a week now.  All I have is a pale blue background, and unresponsive "Options" and "FAQ" buttons in the top-left.  Stuck updating 728 unresponsive files currently.  Have tried deleting and redownloading the entire zite a couple of times now.

>Also make sure that your index.html files in the 08chan zite folder are NOT set to "read only."

Looks like this was the issue.  After shutting that off, then deleting the zite one more time from ZeroHello (and then shutting down ZeroNet and my browser, I'm able to view the front page again.
